icon_wp Tap on white area in the picture above
// guide NEXT Welcome! 
 This fast guide will show you 
 how to use this application. Choose a picture from your gallery, 
 which you want to color balance. 1. You can choose 
 any filter for your picture 
 from the bar. 2. Then, you will have 
 an enlarge view 
 of your picture here. 3. If you choose White Patch filter, 4. tap on white area 
 in the picture view 
 for filter change. 5. To select a new white area 
 press the button. 
 The old one will be deleted. 6. You can save the picture 
 from view with this button 7. or go back and choose 
 another picture from your gallery. Now you can start using 
 White Balance application
"You don't have chosen converted picture to save" "Saved successfully" "Saving in the original quality can take a while"
"You can select new white area in the picture" "You can select white area in the picture"
"Pictures are loading" "Picture is too large, choose smaller one"
